Address.label: Address
Address.value: 300 BOULEVARD OF THE AMERICAS,SUITE 105, LAKEWOOD, New Jersey, 08701, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Reliance Global Group, Inc. operates as a holding company with diversified interests in the insurance and real estate markets. The Company is focused on acquiring growing, cash flow positive insurance agencies. Within the real estate segment, the Company is involved in acquiring, owning, leasing, managing, and redeveloping multifamily residential properties throughout the U.S. for risk-adjusted returns.
